text.more:
Technical details :

Nodes represent the location, organizations and people who were involved in some specific case of harassment/violence against women. There is
an edge between two entities if they co-occur in the same article published by Dhaka Tribune. The articles range from 2007-2016.

Methodology:

1. News articles were filtered by specific keywords related to violence against women.
2. Locations, organizations, people were extracted from the text and used as nodes in the network where the edges were created by co-occurance.
3. The Network is divided into clusters by modularity class.
text.intro:
This network visualization depicts the relationship between people, organization and location
in the sexual harassment and violence against women cases occured in Bangladesh from
2007 to 2016 based on the news published in Dhaka Tribune. Each cluster in general 
represents a case where the size shows the amount of coverage it got from Dhaka Tribune.
text.title: Media coverage of violence against women in Bangladesh

legend.nodeLabel: Location, Organization, People in events related to women harassment, murder or rape
